name: Dreamer (Jake Uskoski)
description:
Fall into the dreamscape. Keyboard  + Mouse game made for GE Jam #3

Note: Reset does not work, sorry! You have to reload the page to start over if you want to do so. Working on a fix but it's a strange bug to say the least.

Currently on v1.0.1

Changelog

v1.0.1:

  • Fixed dash tutorial point (game breaking bug, wasn't unlocking the dash ability necessary to move forward)
  • Fixed camera controls (missing camera leading up to Axe 1 pickup, corrected hit boxes of some camera triggers to prevent getting stuck in a previous camera position)
  • Fixed large hopper ground detection (ground detection didn't scale by size. Large hoppers thought they were permanently in the air and slid on the ground like a skating rink)
  • Fixed hopper direction selection (was being overridden, corrected so the hopper now goes the direction it intends to when a player isn't in aggro range)
  • Increased width of game over continue button to prevent text overflow (cosmetic)
